citations:

 this court in 
Amit Kapoor v. Ramesh Chandra

Supreme Court in

Malkeet Singh Gill v. State of Chhattisgarh
Dilo Begum vs. State of H
Arvind Singh v. State of Bihar

Aluri Venkata Ramana vs. Aluri

Thirupathi Rao and Ors

State of Gujarat v.

Dilipsinh Kishorsinh Rao
